import React from "react"; import {Container, Row, Col} from "react-bootstrap"; import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; import DocumentMeta from "react-document-meta"; function MBBSwithoutNEETForIndianStudents() { const meta = { title: "MBBS without NEET for Indian Students", description: "MBBS without NEET for Indian Students is not possible in India & in abroad too. It is compulsory to qualify NEET to study MBBS in India.", canonical: "https://www.mbbsadmissionsinabroad.com/mbbs-without-neet-for-indian-students", meta: { charset: "utf-8", name: { keywords: "MBBS without NEET for Indian Students" } } }; return (

MBBS without NEET for Indian Students

  • MBBS without NEET for Indian students
  • Apply only to MCI-approved medical university
  • If students could not clear NEET this year, should they wait for another year to get MBBS admission
  • Countries providing MBBS without NEET
  • Conclusion

The Indian students who wish to pursue{" "} MBBS abroad or in India need to clear the country’s medical entrance examination which is known as NEET (National Eligibility Cum Entrance Test). The international students who wish to pursue MBBS in India{" "} need to qualify NEET exam.{" "} MBBS in abroad without NEET {" "} is not possible because the students would not get admission in abroad MCI approved medical college.

{/* */}

MBBS without NEET for Indian students

MBBS without NEET for Indian students is not possible in India & in abroad too. It is compulsory to qualify NEET to{" "} study MBBS in India . The students will not be able to get admission to any{" "} abroad medical university {" "} which is approved by the MCI without NEET.

Apply only to MCI-approved medical university

If the medical university is not approved by the MCI, the medical degree issued by such university is not recognized in India and also has no value in India. If the students want to obtain a medical practice certificate and become a qualified doctor in India, they need to complete their medical graduation from an{" "} MCI-approved medical university {" "} and also clear medical licensing exam.

If students could not clear NEET this year, should they wait for another year to get MBBS admission

The students can take admission in the Pre-Medical Program until their NEET is qualified. Pre-Medical Program is the prelude program to MD Program which is equivalent to MBBS and takes a year to complete. Its syllabus can also assist the students to prepare better for NEET. In one year, they can complete the first phase of the medical program (Pre-Medical Program) and also qualify NEET. After qualifying NEET & Pre-Medical Program, the students can get direct admission to MCI-Approved 4-Year MD Program which is equivalent to MBBS.

Countries providing MBBS without NEET

If the students do not qualify NEET, there is no legitimate medical university in any country that accepts their application for admission to MBBS.{" "} MBBS in Abroad without NEET {" "} is not possible for Indian students.

Conclusion

MBBS in Abroad without NEET is not possible for Indian students under any circumstances. They need to qualify NEET to study MBBS in India or abroad.

{/*
Particulars Per annum Fee
Fees in USD (approx) 4,500
Fee in Indian Rupees (approx) 3,15,000
*/}

Dr Vinit Kumar is a Educational Consultant for India & Abroad with more than 18 Years of Experience.He has an extensive background guiding & assisting medical students to find the best university as per their budget.✔3500 + Students✔ 15 Countries✔ MBBS, MBA, PG, UG✔ 100 % Commitment✔ Education Loan✔ Job Placements

); } export default MBBSwithoutNEETForIndianStudents
